official_title: A bill to establish a right-of-way corridor for electric power transmission lines in the Sunrise Mountain in the State of Nevada, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes a right-of-way corridor for electric power transmission lines within the Sunrise Mountain (Natural Area) Inventory Unit, Nevada.

titles.title: A bill to establish a right-of-way corridor for electric power transmission lines in the Sunrise Mountain in the State of Nevada, and for other purposes.
